nodes.text: The planet Couronne was the namesake of the Couronne system in the Couronne sector, located within the Slice portion of the Expansion Region. It was the homeworld of the humanoid Imzig species.
Utris M'Toc, once a member of the High King's Guard on Couronne, was forced to leave the Imzig home planet following a bloody coup.
Couronne featured as the Imzig homeworld in the Star Wars Insider 148 article "Rogues Gallery: The Cloud City Wing Guards," published in March 2014.

In developing Couronne's background for "Rogues Gallery," contributor Kevin Beentjes consulted with Jason Fry, co-author of the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas and its corresponding StarWars.com Online Companion, the latter of which originally established a star system named Couronne located in grid square P-10.
